title: Male Porn Star Speaks Out: This is Why You Need to Stop Watching Porn ASAP!!
description:
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

I mean, consider the source, is what I'm saying. When dudes watch porn all the time, they start to just screw up their dopamine receptors. So if a dude's sitting there jerking off all night, you know, watching a million different tabs of pornography, when he eventually gets to, you know, have sex with a beautiful woman, he is nowhere near as novel and stimulating as, say, 20-30 different tabs of 20-30 different women doing 20-30 different things. But what it does is it resets the dopamine receptors in a male's brain to be so high that it's always at 10, and then reality steps in and it's never as good. You end up with erectile dysfunction or just not enough novelty or something like that. The purpose of a homo sapien male having testosterone is to what? It is to go kill the thing, build the thing, protect the tribe, accomplish the goal. I'm watching porn, I don't have to do any of those things. Why does my body need testosterone? So now you have these people in your body, your endocrine system is like, why do I need to give this mother****** testosterone? He does nothing. He jerks off and eats waste.
